overview: Marina Kosmatos has over four years experience working for leading global travel publishing company Lonely Planet, and has worked in their headquarters in Melbourne, and in their office in San Francisco. She has also worked as a freelance writer for several lifestyle and culture websites in Australia. Marina has studied at the University of Melbourne and received her B.A of Media Studies from La Trobe University. At Lonely Planet, she worked with many of the world’s leading travel writers and has a thorough understanding of the travel industry and what travelers want. She speaks fluent Greek and Italian and has promised herself that one day she will learn how to speak French. Marina’s favorite travel destination to date has been Cambodia, and she would like to visit Jamaica next.
